data.title: Destination Guide: West Briar (Virginia, Amherst County) in United States
data.meta_description: Discover West Briar in Virginia, Amherst County (United States). Travel ideas and destination guide for your next trip to North America. Events, Webcams and more. Lat/Lng: 37.488, -79.133.
data.text:
Current travel safety evaluation for United States in Northern America

Safety Score: 2,7 of 5.0 based on data from 9 authorites. Meaning we advice caution when travelling to United States.

Travel warnings are updated daily. Source: Travel Warning United States. Last Update: 2024-08-13 08:21:03

Explore West Briar

West Briar in Amherst County (Virginia) is located in United States about 150 mi (or 241 km) south-west of Washington DC, the country's capital.

Local time in West Briar is now 01:44 AM (Thursday). The local timezone is named America / New York with an UTC offset of -4 hours. We know of 10 airports in the wider vicinity of West Briar, of which 5 are larger airports. The closest airport in United States is Lynchburg Regional Preston Glenn Field in a distance of 12 mi (or 19 km), South. Besides the airports, there are other travel options available (check left side).

There is one Unesco world heritage site nearby. It's Monticello and the University of Virginia in Charlottesville in a distance of 97 mi (or 156 km), North-East. Also, if you like golfing, there are multiple options in driving distance. We found 7 points of interest in the vicinity of this place. If you need a place to sleep, we compiled a list of available hotels close to the map centre further down the page.

Depending on your travel schedule, you might want to pay a visit to some of the following locations: Lynchburg, Amherst, Rustburg, Buena Vista and Appomattox. To further explore this place, just scroll down and browse the available info.

Where available, you'll find the corresponding homepage. Otherwise the related wikipedia article.

WKPA

WKPA is a Religious formatted broadcast radio station simulcasting WKBA at Vinton, Virginia. WKPA is licensed to Lynchburg, Virginia, serving Lynchburg and Amherst County, Virginia. WKPA is owned and operated by Tinker Creek Broadcasters, Inc.

Brandywine, Virginia

Brandywine is an unincorporated community in Caroline County, in the U.S. state of Virginia.
